TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableEnum.name: STARTING_DEFAULT_AUTONOMY_STATE
TunableEnum.description: The autonomy state for the 'default' layer. If a Sim doesn't have anything that overrides their autonomy state, this will be used instead. It is NOT used to define the default option in the autonomy options menu, it applies to all Sims that don't have an overridden autonomy state setting. Sims in the playable household will all have an overridden setting.

TunableEnum.name: STARTING_DEFAULT_RANDOMIZATION
TunableEnum.description: The randomization state for the 'default' layer. If a Sim doesn't have anything that overrides their randomization state, this will be used instead.

TunableEnum.name: STARTING_HOUSEHOLD_AUTONOMY_STATE
TunableEnum.description: The default autonomy setting when one hasn't been loaded. This is the default value for the autonomy drop-down in the options menu.

Tunable.name: STARTING_SELECTED_SIM_AUTONOMY
Tunable.description: The default autonomy setting for the selected sim's autonomy. If checked, the selected sim will behave normally according to the autonomy state. If unchecked, the selected sim will not run autonomy at all.
